{"id":924395527,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680114560,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/924395527/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"28.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> x= {-1,0,+1,0}, y= {0,+1,0,-1};\n    int m,n;\n\n    bool isValid(int i,int j){\n        return ((i>=0 && i<m) && (j>=0 && j<n));\n    }\n\n    int bfs(int i, int j,vector<vector<int>>& grid){\n        int ans=1;\n        queue<vector<int>> q;\n        grid[i][j]=2;\n        q.push({i,j});\n        while(!q.empty()){\n            int i_= q.front()[0];\n            int j_= q.front()[1];\n            q.pop();\n            for(int ind=0;ind<4;ind++){\n                if(isValid(i_+x[ind] , j_+y[ind])  && grid[i_+x[ind]][j_+y[ind]]==1){\n                    ans++;\n                    grid[i_+x[ind]][j_+y[ind]]= 2;\n                    q.push({i_+x[ind] , j_+y[ind]});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        m= grid.size();\n        n= grid[0].size();\n        int ans= 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                int temp= 0;\n                if(grid[i][j]==1) temp= bfs(i,j,grid);\n                ans= max(ans,temp);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
